content_block_programmatic.name: jslögg
content_block_programmatic.programmatic_content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>

<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

<g:evaluate var="jvar_day">
	var today = new GlideDateTime().getDayOfWeekLocalTime();
	jslog("MIN PRINT: " + today);
	if (today == '1') {
	jvar_day = true;
	} else if {
	jvar_day = false;
	}
	
	jvar_day = true;

</g:evaluate>


       <j:if test="${jvar_day == true}">
             Day: Friday
       </j:if>
	
	<j:if test="${jvar_day == false}">
             Nope
       </j:if>
	
	${jvar_day}
	
</j:jelly>
